name: Progress Bar Position
desc: Sets the position of the progress bar.

name: Attempt Opacity
desc: Determines how opaque the attempt label should be.

name: Disable Camera Effects
desc: Disables any camera effects, and only focuses the camera on the player. This might break all gamemodes except Cube and Robot.

name: Noclip Accuracy
desc: Informs you how accurate your noclip run is. (Will not work without Anticheat Bypass enabled)

name: Show Graphic Options
desc: Shows you Geometry Dash's graphic options! Useful for Android as the option is normally not available.

name: Show Hitboxes
desc: Show player, obstacle, and solid hitboxes.

name: Show Hitboxes on Death
desc: Shows hitboxes when you die, and hides them when you respawn.
